instructions: POST to /query-voice-to-text - Speech-to-text with product suggestions
description: Upload an audio file to transcribe speech and get product suggestions

form_data.audio: FILE - Audio file (mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, wav, webm)

suggestions.text: STRING - Product suggestions based on transcribed text

notes: Supported formats: mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, wav, webm. Max size: 25MB. Files are automatically deleted after processing.
test_audio_suggestion: Record yourself saying: 'Hola, estoy buscando unos zapatos deportivos para correr'
